summary: Retrieves the SKU-level details of an order transaction
description:
Retrieves the SKU-level details of an order transaction. This covers transactions related to sales, fees, commissions, shipping, taxes, and refunds.​ Applicable for all regions' sellers. Only data after 2023-07-01 is available (Please note that for US cross-border sellers, data before 2025-04-30 is unavailable).​ Version
202501
  
API Testing Tool
​

query.description: Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. ​ Get by API Get Authorization Shop​
Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.​
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders. ​
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.​

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.​

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.​
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.​

children.description: The order ID in TikTok Shop.​
The creation time of the order. Unix timestamp.​
The three-digit currency code in ISO 4217 format. ​
The revenue amount for the order at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the net sales amount.​
The fees and taxes charged by the platform for the order at the time of order settlement. Shipping-related costs are excluded.​
The shipping costs for the order at the time of order settlement.​
The settlement amount for the order.​ ​ Formula: revenue_amount - shipping_cost_amount - fee_tax_amount​
The list of SKU transaction records for the order.​
The SKU ID in TikTok Shop.​
The SKU name.​
The statement ID.​
The product title.​
The SKU quantity included in the order settlement.​
The settlement amount for the SKU.​
The revenue amount at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the sum of all amounts in revenue_breakdown.​
The list of amounts that directly contribute to revenue_amount.​
The total price of all order items before any seller discounts and platform discounts are deducted. This is equivalent to the shop's gross sales.​

The total amount of discounts funded by the seller, including:​ - Seller promotions (Product Discount, Flash Deal, Buy More Save More, Voucher and Bundle Deal)​ - Seller's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns​ - Seller discounts during a campaign​
The total price of all refunded items before any seller discounts. This is equivalent to the shop's gross sales refund.​
Discounts returned to the sellers due to returns or refunds.​
The cash on delivery service fees charged to buyers.​ Applicable only for Saudi Arabia.​
The refund for cash on delivery service fees.​ Applicable only for Saudi Arabia.​
The shipping costs at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the sum of all contributory amounts in shipping_cost_breakdown.​
The list of amounts that directly contribute to shipping_cost_amount.​
The actual shipping fee calculated based on the weight/dimensions measured by the carrier. For details, check shipping_cost_breakdown.supplementary_component.​

The shipping fee subsidies and incentives provided by the platform. This includes all subsidies regardless of fulfillment channels or policies. For details, check shipping_cost_breakdown.supplementary_component.​
The actual shipping fee borne by the customer, calculated based on the product weight uploaded by the seller. Negative numbers refer to the refunded amount of customer-paid shipping fees​
The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of returns.​
The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of goods replacement.​ Applicable only for Indonesia.​
The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of goods exchange.​ Applicable only for Indonesia.​
The fee incurred for packages requiring signature confirmation services​
The shipping insurance fee incurred by the seller for purchasing additional TikTok shipping insurance services.​
Supplementary costs for your reference. These amounts do not directly contribute to shipping_cost_amount.​
The shipping fee discount provided in accordance with a campaign policy. This is part of shipping_fee_discount_amount.​

The additional shipping incentive that the seller will receive if the seller signed up for the Co-Funded Free Shipping Program. A negative amount indicates a reversal of incentives due to order refunds attributed to the seller's responsibility. This is part of shipping_fee_discount_amount.​

The shipping fee subsidy funded by the platform for seller shipping. This is part of shipping_fee_discount_amount.​ - Positive amount represents a subsidy received by the seller.​ - Negative amount represents a subsidy that the seller must return to TikTok Shop.​
The shipping fee discount provided by sellers.​
The fee to offset TikTok Shop Shipping Incentive or customer-paid shipping fee, resulting in a net charge of $0 to the seller.​ Applicable only for the US.​
The shipping fee incurred by the seller for using TikTok Shipping. This is part of actual_shipping_fee_amount.​
The shipping fee incurred by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok (FBT). This is part of actual_shipping_fee_amount.​ Applicable only for EU and UK.​
The shipping and warehouse fulfillment fee incurred by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok (FBT). This is part of actual_shipping_fee_amount.​ Applicable only for the US.​
A reimbursement from TikTok Shop for Fulfilled by TikTok (FBT) orders that don't qualify for free shipping.​ Applicable only for the US.​
The fee borne by the customer to cover the cost of return labels. This fee is collected on the seller's behalf and settled according to the agreed payment terms.​
The total fees and taxes charged by TikTok Shop at the time of order settlement. Shipping-related costs are excluded. This is equivalent to the sum of all contributory amounts in fee_tax_breakdown. ​
The list of amounts that directly contribute to fee_tax_amount.​
The list of fees.​
The commission amount charged by TikTok Shop.​
The referral fee charged for processing successful orders.​ Applicable only for the US. ​
The 20% refund administration fee deducted from the total refunded referral fee amount.​
The transaction fee charged for processing successful orders.​
The handling fee charged when the buyer pays with a credit card.​
The commission amount charged to the seller for payment to the creator.​
The affiliate ads commission paid to a creator before any personal income tax withholding.​ Applicable only for SEA markets.​
The commission amount for purchases through affiliate partner links.​
The commission for eligible orders from ads.​
The service fee charged for participation in the [Seller Free Shipping Programme].​
The service fee charged for participation in the [LIVE Specials Programme].​
The service fee charged for participation in the bonus cashback program.​
The service fee charged for using TikTok Shop Mall.​
The service fee charged for participation in the Voucher Xtra program.​
The service fee charged for participation in flash sales.​
The service fee charged for co-funded promotions.​ ​
The service fee charged when seller joins Pre-order program.​
The commission amount charged by TikTok Shop Partners (TSP).​
The handling fee charged for orders that are fulfilled by Dilayani Tokopedia.​
The eco-contributions TikTok Shop pays on your behalf to the qualified producer responsibility organization (PRO).​
The fee charged to sellers by the platform for each item sold.​ Applicable only for the Brazil market.​
The handling fee charged to the seller for participation in the PayLater program.​
The portion of the creator bonus that you co-fund as part of the commission boost campaign.​
The dynamic commission fee is the amount that the platform charges to all sellers for every successfully delivered order.​ Applicable only for Indonesia.​
The list of tax amounts.​
The VAT paid by the platform on the seller's behalf. ​ Applicable only for cross-border shop orders.​
The import VAT, a tax paid on goods bought in one country and imported into another. ​ Applicable only for cross-border shop orders. In Japan, it refers to the Japan Consumption Tax (JCT).​
The customs duties, a type of tax on cross-border goods collected by governments. ​ Applicable only for cross-border shop orders.​
The fees charged by logistic suppliers for customs clearance services. ​ Applicable only for cross-border shop orders.​
The sales and service tax (SST) collected and remitted to the tax authority by the platform for low-value goods imported into Malaysia, effective January 1, 2024.​
The goods and services tax (GST) collected and remitted to the tax authority by the platform for low-value goods imported into Singapore, effective January 1, 2023. ​
The Mexican VAT that TikTok Shop is required to withhold on your taxable products and remit to the tax authority.​
The Mexican federal income tax that TikTok Shop is required to withhold.​
The anti-dumping duties collected by governments for import goods.​
The VAT paid by the platform on the seller's behalf. Applicable only for local shop orders.​
The personal income tax (PIT) paid by the platform on the seller's behalf.​
The number of transaction records​
